class.name: DojoQuery
class.brief_description: A query builder for retrieving entities from the Dojo world state.
class.description: This class is used to construct queries to retrieve entities from the Dojo world state. You can specify the models to query, a [code]WHERE[/code] clause, and whether to query historical data.

members.member: The [code]WHERE[/code] clause for the query. Use this to filter entities based on their component values.
If [code]true[/code], the query will be executed against historical data. Defaults to [code]false[/code].
An array of model names to query.
If [code]true[/code], the keys will not be hashed before being sent to the Torii client. Defaults to [code]false[/code].
